nodes.name: countEncodedItems

statements.operations:
{
    lengthLen := sub(byte0, 0xf7)
    memPtr := add(memPtr, 1)
    dataLen := div(mload(memPtr), exp(256, sub(WORD_SIZE, lengthLen)))
    decodedLength := add(dataLen, add(lengthLen, 1))
    byte1 := byte(0, mload(memPtr))
}
